ridvan-skin-desc: A responsive MediaWiki skin for Bahaipedia.
ridvan-no-categories: Message to show when no categories available
ridvan-mobile-links-label: Label for the mobile dropdown menu containing interwiki and language links.
czsearch-search-noresults-title: Title shown in the search dropdown when no results are found. $1 is the user's search query.
czsearch-search-noresults-desc: Description shown in the search dropdown when no results are found, advising the user to check spelling.
czsearch-search-fulltext: Label for the button that takes the user to the Special:Search page for a full text search. $1 is the user's search query.
searchsuggest-search: Placeholder text for the search input box.
czsearch-search-editpage: Label for the button that takes the user to edit or create the page. $1 is the page title (search query).
czsearch-search-mediasearch: Label for the button that takes the user to the media search page. $1 is the user's search query.
czsearch-search-empty-desc: Description shown in the search dropdown placeholder when the input is empty.
search-redirect: Label indicating a search result is a redirect. $1 is the target page title.
